data.title: 42nd Annual Grammy® Awards Nominations Coverage (2000)
data.text:
42nd Grammy Award Nominations (2000)

Here's a look at the full list of nominees for the 42nd Annual Grammy Awards. We also have results and commentary for the ceremony.

Category 1 - Record Of The Year

I Want It That Way

Backstreet Boys

Kristian Lundin & Max Martin, producers; Kristian Lundin & Max Martin, engineers/mixers

Track from: Millennium

[Jive Records]

Believe

Cher

Brian Rawling & Mark Taylor, producers; Mark Taylor, engineer/mixer

Track from: Believe

[Warner Bros. Records]

Livin' La Vida Loca

Ricky Martin

Desmond Child & Robi Rosa, producers; Charles Dye, engineer/mixer

Track from: Ricky Martin

[C2/Columbia Records]

Smooth

Santana Featuring Rob Thomas

Matt Serletic, producer; David Thoener, engineer/mixer

Track from: Supernatural

[Arista Records]

No Scrubs

TLC

Kevin "Shekspere" Briggs, producer; Leslie Brathwaite & Carlton Lynn, engineers/mixers

[LaFace Records]
